title: *HOT* Huge Savings on Columbia Jackets and Fleece + Free Shipping!
description: Wow! Score fantastic deals on Columbia fleece and jackets! Columbia is offering an extra 20% off select sale items when you use promo code OCTSAVE at checkout. Plus, shipping is free for rewards members (it’s free to join)! Here are a few deals we spotted… Get this Women’s Westridge Mid Down Jacket for only $63.99Read More
